AI & Computational Biology.title: Comprehensive echocardiogram evaluation with view primed vision language AI
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09850-xComprehensive echocardiogram evaluation with view primed vision language AI
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Echocardiography is the most widely used cardiac imaging modality, capturing ultrasound video data to assess cardiac structure and function1. Artificial intelligence (AI) in echocardiography has the potential to streamline manual tasks and improve reproducibility and precision2. However, most echocardiography AI models are single-view, single-task systems that do not synthesize complementary information from multiple views captured during a full exam3,4, and thus lead to limited performance and scope of applications. To address this problem, we introduce EchoPrime, a multi-view, view-informed, video-based vision-language foundation model trained on over 12 million video-report pairs. EchoPrime uses contrastive learning to train a unified embedding model for all standard views in a comprehensive echocardiogram study with representation of both rare and common diseases and diagnoses. EchoPrime then utilizes view-classification and a view-informed anatomic attention module to weight video-specific embeddings that accurately map the relationship between echocardiographic views and anatomical structures. With retrieval-augmented interpretation, EchoPrime integrates information from all echocardiogram videos in a comprehensive study and performs holistic clinical interpretation. In datasets from five international independent healthcare systems, EchoPrime achieves state-of-the art performance on 23 diverse benchmarks of cardiac form and function, surpassing the performance of both task-specific approaches and prior foundation models. Following rigorous clinical evaluation, EchoPrime can assist physicians in the automated preliminary assessment of comprehensive echocardiography.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 视图引导视觉语言人工智能在综合超声心动图评估中的应用
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 超声心动图是应用最广泛的心脏影像学检查方法，通过捕获超声视频数据来评估心脏结构和功能。人工智能（AI）在超声心动图领域的应用有望简化人工操作，提高检查的可重复性和精确性。然而，大多数超声心动图AI模型是单视图、单任务系统，无法综合利用完整检查过程中捕获的多个视图的互补信息，从而导致其性能和应用范围受限。为解决此问题，我们引入了EchoPrime，这是一个多视图、视图感知、基于视频的视觉语言基础模型，其在超过1200万个视频-报告对上进行了训练。EchoPrime利用对比学习，为综合超声心动图研究中的所有标准视图训练了一个统一的嵌入模型，该模型能够表示罕见和常见疾病及诊断。随后，EchoPrime利用视图分类和视图感知的解剖注意力模块，对视频特异性嵌入进行加权，从而精确映射超声心动图视图与解剖结构之间的关系。借助检索增强型解释，EchoPrime整合了综合研究中所有超声心动图视频的信息，并进行整体临床解释。在来自五个国际独立医疗系统的数据集中，EchoPrime在23个不同的心脏形态和功能基准测试中取得了最先进的性能，超越了任务特定方法和现有基础模型的表现。经过严格的临床评估，EchoPrime能够辅助医生对综合超声心动图进行自动化初步评估。

AI & Computational Biology.title: Multimodal learning enables chat-based exploration of single-cell data
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Biotechnology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41587-025-02857-9CellWhisperer uses multimodal learning of transcriptomes and text to answer questions about single-cell RNA-sequencing data.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Single-cell sequencing characterizes biological samples at unprecedented scale and detail, but data interpretation remains challenging. Here, we present CellWhisperer, an artificial intelligence (AI) model and software tool for chat-based interrogation of gene expression. We establish a multimodal embedding of transcriptomes and their textual annotations, using contrastive learning on 1 million RNA sequencing profiles with AI-curated descriptions. This embedding informs a large language model that answers user-provided questions about cells and genes in natural-language chats. We benchmark CellWhisperer’s performance for zero-shot prediction of cell types and other biological annotations and demonstrate its use for biological discovery in a meta-analysis of human embryonic development. We integrate a CellWhisperer chat box with the CELLxGENE browser, allowing users to interactively explore gene expression through a combined graphical and chat interface. In summary, CellWhisperer leverages large community-scale data repositories to connect transcriptomes and text, thereby enabling interactive exploration of single-cell RNA-sequencing data with natural-language chats. CellWhisperer uses multimodal learning of transcriptomes and text to answer questions about single-cell RNA-sequencing data.

AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 单细胞测序以前所未有的规模和细节表征生物样本，但数据解读仍然充满挑战。在此，我们介绍CellWhisperer，这是一种基于人工智能（AI）的模型和软件工具，用于通过对话方式查询基因表达。我们利用对比学习，在100万个RNA测序图谱及其AI策展的描述上，建立了转录组及其文本注释的多模态嵌入。这种嵌入为大型语言模型提供了信息，使其能够在自然语言对话中回答用户提出的关于细胞和基因的问题。我们对CellWhisperer在细胞类型和其他生物学注释的零样本预测性能进行了基准测试，并在一项人类胚胎发育的荟萃分析中展示了其在生物学发现中的应用。我们将CellWhisperer聊天框与CELLxGENE浏览器集成，使用户能够通过图形和聊天相结合的界面交互式探索基因表达。总之，CellWhisperer利用大型社区规模的数据存储库连接转录组和文本，从而通过自然语言对话实现单细胞RNA测序数据的交互式探索。CellWhisperer利用转录组和文本的多模态学习来回答关于单细胞RNA测序数据的问题。

AI & Computational Biology.title: Zero-shot segmentation using embeddings from a protein language model identifies functional regions in the human proteome
AI & Computational Biology.summary: by Ami G. Sangster, Cameron Dufault, Haoning Qu, Denise Le, Julie D. Forman-Kay, Alan M. MosesThe biological function of a protein is often determined by its distinct functional units, such as folded domains and intrinsically disordered regions. Identifying and categorizing these protein segments from sequence has been a major focus in computational biology which has enabled the automatic annotation of folded protein domains. Here we show that embeddings from the unsupervised protein language model ProtT5 can be used to identify and categorize protein segments without relying on conserved patterns in primary amino acid sequence. We present Zero-shot Protein Segmentation (ZPS), where we use embeddings from ProtT5 to predict the boundaries of protein segments without training or fine-tuning any parameters. We find that ZPS boundary predictions for the human proteome are better at reproducing reviewed annotations from UniProt than established bioinformatics tools and ProtT5 embeddings of ZPS segments can categorize over 200 of the most common UniProt annotations in the human proteome, including folded domains, sub-domains, and intrinsically disordered regions. To explore ZPS predictions, we introduce a new way to visualize protein embeddings that closely resembles diagrams of distinct functional units in protein biology. Since ZPS and segment embeddings can be used without training or fine-tuning, the approach is not biased towards known annotations and can be used to identify and categorize unannotated protein segments. We used the segment embeddings to identify unannotated mitochondrion targeting signals and SYGQ-rich prion-like domains, which are functional regions within intrinsically disordered regions. We expect that the analysis of protein segment embedding similarity can lead to valuable information about protein function, including about intrinsically disordered regions and poorly understood protein regions.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 基于蛋白质语言模型嵌入的零样本分割识别人类蛋白质组中的功能区域
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 蛋白质的生物学功能通常由其独特的结构单元决定，例如折叠结构域和内在无序区。从序列中识别和分类这些蛋白质片段一直是计算生物学的一个主要焦点，这使得折叠蛋白质结构域的自动注释成为可能。在此，我们展示了无监督蛋白质语言模型ProtT5的嵌入可用于识别和分类蛋白质片段，而无需依赖一级氨基酸序列中的保守模式。我们提出了零样本蛋白质分割（ZPS）方法，该方法利用ProtT5的嵌入来预测蛋白质片段的边界，而无需进行任何参数的训练或微调。我们发现，ZPS对人类蛋白质组的边界预测在重现UniProt中经过评审的注释方面优于已有的生物信息学工具，并且ZPS片段的ProtT5嵌入可以对人类蛋白质组中200多种最常见的UniProt注释进行分类，包括折叠结构域、亚结构域和内在无序区。为了探索ZPS的预测结果，我们引入了一种新的蛋白质嵌入可视化方法，该方法与蛋白质生物学中不同功能单元的图示非常相似。由于ZPS和片段嵌入无需训练或微调即可使用，因此该方法不会偏向于已知注释，可用于识别和分类未注释的蛋白质片段。我们利用这些片段嵌入识别了未注释的线粒体靶向信号和富含SYGQ的朊病毒样结构域，它们是内在无序区内的功能区域。我们预计，对蛋白质片段嵌入相似性的分析可以为蛋白质功能提供有价值的信息，包括关于内在无序区和了解不足的蛋白质区域的信息。

AI & Computational Biology.title: Universal consensus 3D segmentation of cells from 2D segmented stacks
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Methods, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41592-025-02887-wu-Segment3D is a universal framework that translates and enhances 2D instance segmentations to a 3D consensus instance segmentation without training data. It performs well across diverse datasets, including cells with complex morphologies.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Cell segmentation is the foundation of a wide range of microscopy-based biological studies. Deep learning has revolutionized two-dimensional (2D) cell segmentation, enabling generalized solutions across cell types and imaging modalities. This has been driven by the ease of scaling up image acquisition, annotation and computation. However, three-dimensional (3D) cell segmentation, requiring dense annotation of 2D slices, still poses substantial challenges. Manual labeling of 3D cells to train broadly applicable segmentation models is prohibitive. Even in high-contrast images annotation is ambiguous and time-consuming. Here we develop a theory and toolbox, u-Segment3D, for 2D-to-3D segmentation, compatible with any 2D method generating pixel-based instance cell masks. u-Segment3D translates and enhances 2D instance segmentations to a 3D consensus instance segmentation without training data, as demonstrated on 11 real-life datasets, comprising >70,000 cells, spanning single cells, cell aggregates and tissue. Moreover, u-Segment3D is competitive with native 3D segmentation, even exceeding when cells are crowded and have complex morphologies. u-Segment3D is a universal framework that translates and enhances 2D instance segmentations to a 3D consensus instance segmentation without training data. It performs well across diverse datasets, including cells with complex morphologies.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 基于二维分割堆栈的细胞通用共识三维分割
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 细胞分割是广泛的基于显微镜的生物学研究的基础。深度学习彻底改变了二维（2D）细胞分割，实现了跨细胞类型和成像模式的通用解决方案。这得益于图像采集、标注和计算的规模化便利性。然而，三维（3D）细胞分割需要对二维切片进行密集标注，这仍然带来了巨大的挑战。手动标注三维细胞以训练广泛适用的分割模型是难以承受的。即使在高对比度图像中，标注也存在模糊性且耗时。在此，我们开发了一种用于2D到3D分割的理论和工具箱u-Segment3D，它兼容任何生成基于像素的实例细胞掩膜的2D方法。u-Segment3D无需训练数据即可将2D实例分割转换为并增强为3D共识实例分割，这在包含超过70,000个细胞的11个真实数据集上得到了验证，这些数据集涵盖了单细胞、细胞聚集体和组织。此外，u-Segment3D与原生3D分割方法相比具有竞争力，甚至在细胞拥挤且形态复杂时表现更优。u-Segment3D是一个通用框架，无需训练数据即可将2D实例分割转换为并增强为3D共识实例分割，并在包括形态复杂细胞在内的各种数据集上表现良好。

AI & Computational Biology.title: AlphaSync is an enhanced AlphaFold structure database synchronized with UniProt
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41594-025-01719-xAlphaSync synchronizes AlphaFold Protein Structure Database predictions with UniProt sequences, providing up-to-date protein structures with residue-level annotations for humans, model organisms and pathogens through an accessible web interface and application programming interface.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Accurate prediction of protein structures is essential for understanding biological functions and guiding biomedical research. However, maintaining synchronization between structure models and rapidly expanding, continuously evolving protein sequence databases remains a major challenge. Here, we present AlphaSync ( alphasync.stjude.org ), a comprehensive resource that complements the AlphaFold Protein Structure Database. AlphaSync currently provides 2.6 million UniProt-synchronized structural models, including predictions for 40,016 updated proteins and isoforms from 925 species. AlphaSync achieves complete, up-to-date proteome coverage for 42 species, including humans, key pathogens and model organisms. It also provides residue-level annotations such as solvent accessibility, dihedral angles, intrinsic disorder status and over 4.7 billion atom-level noncovalent contacts. Its up-to-date structural models and detailed annotations will facilitate the study of protein structure–function relationships, assessment of sequence variants and machine learning tasks including protein design. With an intuitive web interface and application programming interface, AlphaSync enables protein research at scale and in detail. AlphaSync synchronizes AlphaFold Protein Structure Database predictions with UniProt sequences, providing up-to-date protein structures with residue-level annotations for humans, model organisms and pathogens through an accessible web interface and application programming interface.

AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 蛋白质结构准确预测对于理解生物功能和指导生物医学研究至关重要。然而，在结构模型与快速扩展、持续演进的蛋白质序列数据库之间保持同步仍然是一个重大挑战。在此，我们介绍了AlphaSync (alphasync.stjude.org)，这是一个补充AlphaFold蛋白质结构数据库的综合资源。AlphaSync目前提供了260万个与UniProt同步的结构模型，其中包括来自925个物种的40,016个更新蛋白质和异构体的预测。AlphaSync为包括人类、关键病原体和模式生物在内的42个物种提供了完整且最新的蛋白质组覆盖。它还提供了残基水平的注释，例如溶剂可及性、二面角、内在无序状态以及超过47亿个原子水平的非共价接触。其最新的结构模型和详细注释将促进蛋白质结构-功能关系的研究、序列变异的评估以及包括蛋白质设计在内的机器学习任务。凭借直观的网络界面和应用程序编程接口，AlphaSync能够大规模、详细地开展蛋白质研究。AlphaSync通过可访问的网络界面和应用程序编程接口，将AlphaFold蛋白质结构数据库的预测与UniProt序列同步，为人类、模式生物和病原体提供带有残基水平注释的最新蛋白质结构。

AI & Computational Biology.title: Digital dementia and testing of cognitive intervention for degenerating neural networks
AI & Computational Biology.summary: npj Systems Biology and Applications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41540-025-00596-wDigital dementia and testing of cognitive intervention for degenerating neural networks
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: The development of effective interventions for neurodegenerative disorders, such as posterior cortical atrophy (a visual Alzheimer’s variant), remains to be a significant clinical challenge. We introduce a computational framework using convolutional neural networks (CNNs) as in silico models to simulate visual system degeneration and evaluate intervention strategies. By modeling controlled synaptic decay and comparing three distinct retraining approaches, random data (control), accuracy-based, and entropy-based, we assess impacts on classification performance and neural representation geometry. Our results demonstrate that accuracy-based retraining outperformed other strategies, maintaining model performance and preserving optimal manifold geometry during intermediate degeneration stages. This computational analysis supports prioritizing accuracy-targeted interventions for cognitive compensation. Our framework enables rapid evaluation of intervention efficacy while elucidating computational principles underlying neurodegeneration and recovery. This approach offers a platform for refining strategies to slow visual-cognitive decline in neurodegenerative diseases, bridging mechanistic insights with clinical translation.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 数字痴呆：退化神经网络认知干预策略的评估
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 神经退行性疾病（如后皮层萎缩，一种视觉型阿尔茨海默病变体）有效干预措施的开发，仍然是一个重大的临床挑战。本研究引入了一个计算框架，该框架利用卷积神经网络（CNN）作为计算机模拟模型，以模拟视觉系统退化并评估干预策略。通过模拟受控的突触衰减，并比较三种不同的再训练方法——随机数据（对照）、基于准确性和基于熵的方法，我们评估了它们对分类性能和神经表征几何结构的影响。我们的结果表明，在中间退化阶段，基于准确性的再训练优于其他策略，能够保持模型性能并保留最佳流形几何结构。这项计算分析支持优先考虑以准确性为目标的干预措施，以实现认知补偿。我们的框架能够快速评估干预措施的有效性，同时阐明神经退行性变和恢复背后的计算原理。这种方法为完善减缓神经退行性疾病中视觉认知衰退的策略提供了一个平台，将机制洞察与临床转化相结合。

AI & Computational Biology.title: Automated C. elegans behavior analysis via deep learning-based detection and tracking
AI & Computational Biology.summary: by Xiaoke Liu, Jianming Liu, Wenjie Teng, Yuzhong Peng, Boao Li, Xiaoqing Han, Jing HuoAs a well-established and extensively utilized model organism, Caenorhabditis elegans (C. elegans) serves as a crucial platform for investigating behavioral regulation mechanisms and their biological significance. However, manually tracking the locomotor behavior of large numbers of C. elegans is both cumbersome and inefficient. To address the above challenges, we innovatively propose an automated approach for analyzing C. elegans behavior through deep learning-based detection and tracking. Building upon existing research, we developed an enhanced worm detection framework that integrates YOLOv8 with ByteTrack, enabling real-time, precise tracking of multiple worms. Based on the tracking results, we further established an automated high-throughput method for quantitative analysis of multiple movement parameters, including locomotion velocity, body bending angle, and roll frequency, thereby laying a robust foundation for high-precision, automated analysis of complex worm behaviors. including movement speed, body bending angle, and roll frequency, thereby laying a robust foundation for high-precision, automated analysis of complex worm behaviors. Comparative evaluations demonstrate that the proposed enhanced C. elegans detection framework outperforms existing methods, achieving a precision of 99.5%, recall of 98.7%, and mAP50 of 99.6%, with a processing speed of 153 frames per second (FPS). The established framework for worm detection, tracking, and automated behavioral analysis developed in this study delivers superior detection and tracking accuracy while enhancing tracking continuity and robustness. Unlike traditional labor-intensive measurement approaches, our framework supports simultaneous tracking of multiple worms while maintaining automated extraction of various behavioral parameters with high precision. Furthermore, our approach advances the standardization of C. elegans behavioral parameter analysis, which can analyze the behavioral data of multiple worms at the same time, significantly improving the experimental throughput and providing an efficient tool for drug screening, gene function research and other fields.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 基于深度学习检测与追踪的秀丽隐杆线虫行为自动化分析
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 秀丽隐杆线虫（C. elegans）作为一种成熟且广泛使用的模式生物，是研究行为调控机制及其生物学意义的重要平台。然而，手动追踪大量秀丽隐杆线虫的运动行为既繁琐又低效。为解决上述挑战，我们创新性地提出了一种基于深度学习检测与追踪的秀丽隐杆线虫行为自动化分析方法。在现有研究的基础上，我们开发了一种增强型线虫检测框架，该框架将YOLOv8与ByteTrack相结合，实现了对多条线虫的实时精确追踪。基于追踪结果，我们进一步建立了一种自动化高通量方法，用于定量分析多种运动参数，包括运动速度、身体弯曲角度和翻滚频率，从而为复杂线虫行为的高精度自动化分析奠定了坚实基础。比较评估表明，所提出的增强型秀丽隐杆线虫检测框架优于现有方法，实现了99.5%的精确度、98.7%的召回率和99.6%的mAP50，处理速度达到每秒153帧（FPS）。本研究开发的线虫检测、追踪和自动化行为分析框架，在提供卓越的检测和追踪精度的同时，增强了追踪的连续性和鲁棒性。与传统劳动密集型测量方法不同，我们的框架支持同时追踪多条线虫，并能高精度地自动化提取各种行为参数。此外，我们的方法推动了秀丽隐杆线虫行为参数分析的标准化，能够同时分析多条线虫的行为数据，显著提高了实验通量，为药物筛选、基因功能研究等领域提供了高效工具。

AI & Computational Biology.title: A software platform for real-time and adaptive neuroscience experiments
AI & Computational Biology.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64856-3An optimal model-experiment integration for testing many complex hypotheses is still lacking. Here authors introduce improv, a modular software platform enabling real-time adaptive neuroscience experiments, orchestrating parallel data collection, modeling, and experimental control. Authors demonstrate various use cases, including online neural analysis and closed-loop optogenetics in zebrafish.
AI & Computational Biology.abstract: Current neuroscience research is often limited to testing predetermined hypotheses and post hoc analysis of already collected data. Adaptive experimental designs, in which modeling drives ongoing data collection and selects experimental manipulations, offer a promising alternative. However, such adaptive paradigms require tight integration between software and hardware under real-time constraints. We introduce improv, a software platform for flexible integration of modeling, data collection, analysis pipelines, and live experimental control. We demonstrate both in silico and in vivo how improv enables efficient experimental designs for discovery and validation across various model organisms and data types. We used improv to orchestrate real-time behavioral analyses, rapid functional typing of neural responses via calcium imaging, optimal visual stimulus selection, and model-driven optogenetic photostimulation of visually responsive neurons in the zebrafish brain. Together, these results demonstrate the power of improv to integrate modeling with data collection and experimental control to achieve next-generation adaptive experiments. Authors demonstrate various use cases, including online neural analysis and closed-loop optogenetics in zebrafish.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 一个用于实时和自适应神经科学实验的软件平台
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 当前的神经科学研究常受限于检验预设假设以及对已收集数据的回顾性分析。自适应实验设计，即通过模型驱动持续数据收集并选择实验操作，提供了一种有前景的替代方案。然而，此类自适应范式要求在实时约束下实现软件与硬件的紧密集成。我们引入了improv，一个能够灵活集成建模、数据收集、分析流程和实时实验控制的软件平台。我们通过计算机模拟（in silico）和体内（in vivo）实验证明了improv如何为各种模式生物和数据类型实现高效的实验设计，以促进科学发现和验证。我们利用improv协调了实时行为分析、通过钙成像对神经反应进行快速功能分型、优化视觉刺激选择，以及在斑马鱼大脑中对视觉响应神经元进行模型驱动的光遗传学光刺激。综上所述，这些结果展示了improv在整合建模与数据收集和实验控制方面的强大能力，从而实现下一代自适应实验。目前，针对许多复杂假设进行测试的最佳模型-实验集成仍有待完善。本文作者在此介绍了improv，一个模块化的软件平台，它能够实现实时自适应神经科学实验，并协调并行的数据收集、建模和实验控制。

AI & Computational Biology.title: IPScan: Detecting novel intronic PolyAdenylation events with RNA-seq data
AI & Computational Biology.summary: by Naima Ahmed Fahmi, Sze Cheng, Jeovani Overstreet, Qianqian Song, Jeongsik Yong, Wei ZhangIntronic PolyAdenylation (IPA) is an important post-transcriptional mechanism that can alter transcript coding potential by truncating translation regions, thereby increasing transcriptome and proteome diversity. This process generates novel protein isoforms with altered peptide sequences, some of which are implicated in disease progression, including cancer. Truncated proteins may lose tumor-suppressive functions, contributing to oncogenesis. Despite advancements in Alternative PolyAdenylation (APA) analysis using RNA-seq, detecting and quantifying novel IPA events remains challenging. To address this, we developed IPScan, a computational pipeline for precise IPA event identification, quantification, and visualization. IPScan has been benchmarked against existing methods using simulated data, different human and mouse cell lines, and TCGA (The Cancer Genome Atlas) breast cancer datasets. Differential IPA events under different biological conditions were quantified and validated via qPCR.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: IPScan：基于RNA测序数据检测新型内含子多聚腺苷酸化事件
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 内含子多聚腺苷酸化 (IPA) 是一种重要的转录后机制，它通过截短翻译区域来改变转录本的编码潜力，从而增加转录组和蛋白质组的多样性。该过程产生具有改变肽序列的新型蛋白质异构体，其中一些与疾病进展（包括癌症）有关。截短的蛋白质可能丧失肿瘤抑制功能，从而促进肿瘤发生。尽管利用RNA测序进行选择性多聚腺苷酸化 (APA) 分析取得了进展，但检测和量化新型IPA事件仍然具有挑战性。为解决这一问题，我们开发了IPScan，这是一个用于精确识别、量化和可视化IPA事件的计算流程。IPScan已使用模拟数据、不同的人和小鼠细胞系以及TCGA（癌症基因组图谱）乳腺癌数据集与现有方法进行了基准测试。在不同生物学条件下，差异IPA事件通过qPCR进行了量化和验证。

AI & Computational Biology.title: Individual trajectories for recovery of neocortical activity in disorders of consciousness
AI & Computational Biology.summary: by Prejaas K. B. Tewarie, Romesh Abeysuriya, Rajanikant Panda, Pablo Nùñez, Marie M. Vitello, Glenn van der Lande, Olivia Gosseries, Aurore Thibaut, Steven Laureys, Gustavo Deco, Jitka AnnenThe evolution from disturbed brain activity to physiological brain rhythms can precede recovery in patients with disorders of consciousness (DoC). Accordingly, intriguing questions arise: What are the pathophysiological factors associated to disrupted brain rhythms in patients with DoC, and are there potential pathways for individual patients with DoC to return to normal brain rhythms? We addressed these questions at the individual subject level using biophysical simulations based on electroencephalography (EEG). The main findings are that unconscious patients exhibit a loss of excitatory corticothalamic synaptic strength. Synaptic plasticity in this excitatory corticothalamic circuitry facilitates the return of physiological brain rhythms, characterized by the reappearance of spectral peaks and flattening of the aperiodic (1/f) component of the power spectrum, in the selection of patients with DoC, particularly in those who are minimally conscious. The extent to which this occurred was correlated with cerebral glucose uptake. The current findings emphasize the importance of excitatory thalamocortical activity in reestablishing normal brain rhythms after brain injury and show that biophysical modelling of the corticothalamic circuitry could help select patients who might be potentially receptive to treatment and undergo plasticity.

AI & Computational Biology.title_cn: 意识障碍患者新皮层活动恢复的个体轨迹
AI & Computational Biology.abstract_cn: 意识障碍 (DoC) 患者的恢复，可能以紊乱脑活动向生理性脑节律的演变为前导。因此，引人深思的问题随之产生：与意识障碍患者脑节律紊乱相关的病理生理学因素是什么？以及意识障碍个体患者是否存在恢复正常脑节律的潜在途径？我们利用基于脑电图 (EEG) 的生物物理模拟，在个体受试者层面探讨了这些问题。主要发现是，无意识患者表现出兴奋性皮层-丘脑突触强度的丧失。在部分意识障碍患者（尤其是微意识状态患者）中，这种兴奋性皮层-丘脑回路中的突触可塑性有助于生理性脑节律的恢复，其特征是频谱峰值的再现以及功率谱中非周期性 (1/f) 成分的平坦化。这种恢复的程度与脑葡萄糖摄取量相关。当前研究结果强调了兴奋性丘脑-皮层活动在脑损伤后重建正常脑节律中的重要性，并表明皮层-丘脑回路的生物物理建模有助于筛选可能对治疗有反应并能发生可塑性的患者。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Comprehensive echocardiogram evaluation with view primed vision language AI
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09850-xComprehensive echocardiogram evaluation with view primed vision language AI
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Echocardiography is the most widely used cardiac imaging modality, capturing ultrasound video data to assess cardiac structure and function1. Artificial intelligence (AI) in echocardiography has the potential to streamline manual tasks and improve reproducibility and precision2. However, most echocardiography AI models are single-view, single-task systems that do not synthesize complementary information from multiple views captured during a full exam3,4, and thus lead to limited performance and scope of applications. To address this problem, we introduce EchoPrime, a multi-view, view-informed, video-based vision-language foundation model trained on over 12 million video-report pairs. EchoPrime uses contrastive learning to train a unified embedding model for all standard views in a comprehensive echocardiogram study with representation of both rare and common diseases and diagnoses. EchoPrime then utilizes view-classification and a view-informed anatomic attention module to weight video-specific embeddings that accurately map the relationship between echocardiographic views and anatomical structures. With retrieval-augmented interpretation, EchoPrime integrates information from all echocardiogram videos in a comprehensive study and performs holistic clinical interpretation. In datasets from five international independent healthcare systems, EchoPrime achieves state-of-the art performance on 23 diverse benchmarks of cardiac form and function, surpassing the performance of both task-specific approaches and prior foundation models. Following rigorous clinical evaluation, EchoPrime can assist physicians in the automated preliminary assessment of comprehensive echocardiography.

Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 视图引导视觉语言人工智能在综合超声心动图评估中的应用
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 超声心动图是应用最广泛的心脏影像学检查方法，通过捕获超声视频数据来评估心脏结构和功能。人工智能（AI）在超声心动图领域的应用有望简化人工操作，提高检查的可重复性和精确性。然而，大多数超声心动图AI模型是单视图、单任务系统，无法综合利用完整检查过程中捕获的多个视图的互补信息，从而导致其性能和应用范围受限。为解决此问题，我们引入了EchoPrime，这是一个多视图、视图感知、基于视频的视觉语言基础模型，其在超过1200万个视频-报告对上进行了训练。EchoPrime利用对比学习，为综合超声心动图研究中的所有标准视图训练了一个统一的嵌入模型，该模型能够表示罕见和常见疾病及诊断。随后，EchoPrime利用视图分类和视图感知的解剖注意力模块，对视频特异性嵌入进行加权，从而精确映射超声心动图视图与解剖结构之间的关系。借助检索增强型解释，EchoPrime整合了综合研究中所有超声心动图视频的信息，并进行整体临床解释。在来自五个国际独立医疗系统的数据集中，EchoPrime在23个不同的心脏形态和功能基准测试中取得了最先进的性能，超越了任务特定方法和现有基础模型的表现。经过严格的临床评估，EchoPrime能够辅助医生对综合超声心动图进行自动化初步评估。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Single-cell analysis reveals cell death as driver of NLRP3-mediated secretion of IL-1β in human monocytes
Clinical & Medicine.summary: Nature Immunology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41590-025-02319-zLamkanfi, Shirasaki, Izawa and colleagues show that IL-1β release in human monocytes stimulated with lipopolysaccharide or carrying NLRP3 activatory mutations is mostly restricted to cells undergoing lytic cell death.
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: Interleukin-1β (IL-1β) is a key proinflammatory cytokine with critical roles in infections and inflammatory diseases, yet the mechanisms regulating its release from human monocytes remain unclear. Here we used a suite of single-cell approaches, including integrated live-cell imaging of secretion and cell fate, flow cytometry and high-content imaging, to investigate IL-1β secretion dynamics in lipopolysaccharide-stimulated primary human peripheral blood CD14+ monocytes. We found marked heterogeneity: a large fraction of cells remained viable and contributed negligibly to IL-1β secretion, challenging established models. Instead, a small subset (5–10%) undergoing canonical NLRP3 inflammasome activation and GSDMD-dependent pyroptosis produced the majority of secreted IL-1β, with a smaller contribution from apoptotic cells transitioning to secondary necrosis. Single-cell profiling of CD14+ monocytes from patients with cryopyrin-associated periodic syndrome confirmed lytic cell death as the driver of pathological IL-1β release. These findings redefine IL-1β as a damage-associated molecular pattern, secreted predominantly by dying monocytes. Lamkanfi, Shirasaki, Izawa and colleagues show that IL-1β release in human monocytes stimulated with lipopolysaccharide or carrying NLRP3 activatory mutations is mostly restricted to cells undergoing lytic cell death.

Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 单细胞分析揭示细胞死亡是人单核细胞中NLRP3介导的IL-1β分泌的驱动因素
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 白细胞介素-1β (IL-1β) 是一种关键的促炎细胞因子，在感染和炎症性疾病中发挥着重要作用，然而，其从人单核细胞中释放的调控机制仍不清楚。本研究中，我们采用了一系列单细胞方法，包括分泌和细胞命运的整合活细胞成像、流式细胞术和高内涵成像，以研究脂多糖刺激的原代人外周血CD14+单核细胞中IL-1β的分泌动态。我们发现显著的异质性：大部分细胞保持活力，对IL-1β分泌的贡献微乎其微，这挑战了既有的模型。相反，一小部分（5-10%）经历经典NLRP3炎性体激活和GSDMD依赖性细胞焦亡的细胞产生了大部分分泌的IL-1β，而从凋亡细胞向继发性坏死转变的细胞贡献较小。对冷吡啉相关周期综合征患者CD14+单核细胞的单细胞分析证实，裂解性细胞死亡是病理性IL-1β释放的驱动因素。这些发现将IL-1β重新定义为一种损伤相关分子模式，主要由垂死的单核细胞分泌。Lamkanfi、Shirasaki、Izawa及其同事的研究表明，在脂多糖刺激或携带NLRP3激活突变的人单核细胞中，IL-1β的释放主要局限于经历裂解性细胞死亡的细胞。

Clinical & Medicine.title: Digital dementia and testing of cognitive intervention for degenerating neural networks
Clinical & Medicine.summary: npj Systems Biology and Applications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41540-025-00596-wDigital dementia and testing of cognitive intervention for degenerating neural networks
Clinical & Medicine.abstract: The development of effective interventions for neurodegenerative disorders, such as posterior cortical atrophy (a visual Alzheimer’s variant), remains to be a significant clinical challenge. We introduce a computational framework using convolutional neural networks (CNNs) as in silico models to simulate visual system degeneration and evaluate intervention strategies. By modeling controlled synaptic decay and comparing three distinct retraining approaches, random data (control), accuracy-based, and entropy-based, we assess impacts on classification performance and neural representation geometry. Our results demonstrate that accuracy-based retraining outperformed other strategies, maintaining model performance and preserving optimal manifold geometry during intermediate degeneration stages. This computational analysis supports prioritizing accuracy-targeted interventions for cognitive compensation. Our framework enables rapid evaluation of intervention efficacy while elucidating computational principles underlying neurodegeneration and recovery. This approach offers a platform for refining strategies to slow visual-cognitive decline in neurodegenerative diseases, bridging mechanistic insights with clinical translation.

Clinical & Medicine.title_cn: 数字痴呆：退化神经网络认知干预策略的评估
Clinical & Medicine.abstract_cn: 神经退行性疾病（如后皮层萎缩，一种视觉型阿尔茨海默病变体）有效干预措施的开发，仍然是一个重大的临床挑战。本研究引入了一个计算框架，该框架利用卷积神经网络（CNN）作为计算机模拟模型，以模拟视觉系统退化并评估干预策略。通过模拟受控的突触衰减，并比较三种不同的再训练方法——随机数据（对照）、基于准确性和基于熵的方法，我们评估了它们对分类性能和神经表征几何结构的影响。我们的结果表明，在中间退化阶段，基于准确性的再训练优于其他策略，能够保持模型性能并保留最佳流形几何结构。这项计算分析支持优先考虑以准确性为目标的干预措施，以实现认知补偿。我们的框架能够快速评估干预措施的有效性，同时阐明神经退行性变和恢复背后的计算原理。这种方法为完善减缓神经退行性疾病中视觉认知衰退的策略提供了一个平台，将机制洞察与临床转化相结合。

Structure.title: High performance tandem perovskite LEDs through interlayer photon recycling
Structure.summary: Nature, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09865-4High performance tandem perovskite LEDs through interlayer photon recycling
Structure.abstract: Tandem light-emitting diodes (LEDs), achieved by vertically stacking multiple units in series to combine the luminance of individual light-emitting elements, are effective for improving efficiency and lifespan compared to single-unit devices1–3. In particular, tandem perovskite LEDs benefit from the small Stokes shifts of perovskites4, which in principle can enable significant photon recycling between individual perovskite layers and enhance light extraction from trapped modes. However, a tandem structure that effectively merges the luminance of each perovskite units still remains a significant challenge. Here, we demonstrate efficient and stable tandem LEDs by combining two solution-processed perovskite light-emitting units. This tandem structure effectively combines the original luminance of each light-emitting units; we argue that the emissions are also significantly enhanced through photon recycling between the individual light-emitting units. Consequently, we achieve tandem perovskite LEDs with a low turn-on voltage of 3.2 V, a high peak external quantum efficiency (EQE) of 45.5% (even 20% higher than the sum of peak EQEs of single-unit devices), an average peak EQE of 40.9%, and a half-lifetime of 64 h at an initial radiance of 70 W Sr−1 m−2. These findings represent a significant advancement in achieving high-performance and multicolor LEDs through the stacking of perovskite LEDs.

Structure.title_cn: 通过层间光子再循环实现高性能叠层钙钛矿发光二极管
Structure.abstract_cn: 叠层发光二极管（LED）通过将多个发光单元垂直串联堆叠，以结合单个发光元件的亮度，与单单元器件相比，能有效提高效率和寿命1-3。特别是，叠层钙钛矿LED受益于钙钛矿材料小的斯托克斯位移4，这原则上可以实现单个钙钛矿层之间显著的光子再循环，并增强对陷阱模式光的提取。然而，如何构建一种能有效融合各个钙钛矿单元亮度的叠层结构，仍然是一个重大挑战。在此，我们通过结合两个溶液处理的钙钛矿发光单元，展示了高效稳定的叠层LED。这种叠层结构有效结合了每个发光单元的原始亮度；我们认为，通过单个发光单元之间的光子再循环，发光强度也得到了显著增强。因此，我们实现了具有低启亮电压3.2 V、高峰值外量子效率（EQE）45.5%（甚至比单单元器件的峰值EQE总和高出20%）、平均峰值EQE 40.9%，以及在初始辐射亮度为70 W Sr−1 m−2下半衰期达64小时的叠层钙钛矿LED。这些发现代表了通过钙钛矿LED堆叠实现高性能和多色LED的重大进展。

Structure.title: CO<sub>2</sub>-triggered reversible transformation of soft elastomers into rigid and highly fluorescent plastics
Structure.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65495-4Carbon dioxide responsive polymers are promising for smart technologies, though it is challenging to effectively regulate these properties reliably. Here the authors report an elastomer composed of polyethyleneimine and polydimethylsiloxane which can reversibly its Young’s modulus responding to carbon dioxide.
Structure.abstract: Polymers that alter their properties and functions in response to carbon dioxide (CO2) exposure offer significant potential for the development of smart technologies and innovative CO2 utilization approaches. Nonetheless, effectively regulating the behavior of solid-state polymers using CO2 remains a considerable challenge, highlighting the need for robust and reliable strategies to address this issue. This study presents elastomers that feature nanophase-separated morphologies composed of CO2-vitrifiable polyethyleneimine and CO2-permeable polydimethylsiloxane components. The elastomers (Young’s modulus (E) of approximately 1 MPa) reversibly transform into hard plastics (E > 2 GPa) in the presence of CO2. In addition to bulk stiffening, their surface adhesion and friction rapidly shift, and the material’s fluorescence is significantly amplified. Here, we show that these multifunctional responses to CO2 position the materials as innovative platforms for responsive mechanical systems and CO2-activated optical devices, with potential applications in sensing, display, and data storage technologies. Carbon dioxide responsive polymers are promising for smart technologies, though it is challenging to effectively regulate these properties reliably. Here the authors report an elastomer composed of polyethyleneimine and polydimethylsiloxane which can reversibly its Young’s modulus responding to carbon dioxide.

Structure.title_cn: CO₂触发的软弹性体向刚性高荧光塑料的可逆转化
Structure.abstract_cn: 聚合物在暴露于二氧化碳(CO₂)时能改变其性质和功能，这为智能技术和创新的CO₂利用方法的发展提供了巨大潜力。然而，利用CO₂有效调控固态聚合物的行为仍然是一个重大挑战，这凸显了开发稳健可靠策略来解决这一问题的必要性。本研究介绍了一种弹性体，其具有纳米相分离形貌，由CO₂可玻璃化的聚乙烯亚胺和CO₂可渗透的聚二甲基硅氧烷组分构成。在CO₂存在下，这些弹性体（杨氏模量(E)约为1 MPa）可逆地转化为硬塑料（E > 2 GPa）。除了整体刚度增加外，其表面粘附性和摩擦力也迅速改变，并且材料的荧光显著增强。我们在此展示，这些对CO₂的多功能响应使该材料成为响应式机械系统和CO₂激活光学器件的创新平台，在传感、显示和数据存储技术中具有潜在应用。二氧化碳响应性聚合物在智能技术中前景广阔，但有效且可靠地调控其性能仍具挑战。本文作者报道了一种由聚乙烯亚胺和聚二甲基硅氧烷组成的弹性体，其杨氏模量可随二氧化碳响应而可逆变化。

Structure.title: A phage-encoded anti-CRISPR protein co-opts host enolase to prevent type III CRISPR immunity
Structure.summary: Nature Microbiology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41564-025-02178-2Streptococcus thermophilus phages circumvent host CRISPR defences via AcrIIIA2, which complexes with enolase, a highly abundant glycolysis enzyme, to block phage RNA binding.
Structure.abstract: CRISPR (Clustered Regularly Interspaced Short Palindromic Repeats) systems provide powerful adaptive immunity against phage infection. In response, phages use anti-CRISPR (Acr) proteins to evade CRISPR immunity. The few type III Acrs identified so far show conditional effectiveness in countering type III immunity or rely on unknown or poorly understood inhibitory mechanisms. Here we report the discovery of AcrIIIA2, a type III-A Acr encoded by Streptococcus thermophilus phages. Biochemical and structural analyses reveal that phage AcrIIIA2 co-opts host enolase, a highly abundant glycolysis enzyme, to form a ternary complex with the S. thermophilus type III-A (Csm) CRISPR ribonucleoprotein complex, obstructing its immune responses. The enolase-chaperoned AcrIIIA2 blocks the initial step of phage RNA binding, thereby preventing downstream type III anti-phage immune responses. Enolase participates in the anti-immune response by serving as an essential structural scaffold, stabilizing Acr–CRISPR interactions. These findings uncover a new anti-defence strategy that exploits a well-conserved host factor to block CRISPR immunity. Streptococcus thermophilus phages circumvent host CRISPR defences via AcrIIIA2, which complexes with enolase, a highly abundant glycolysis enzyme, to block phage RNA binding.

Structure.title_cn: 噬菌体编码的抗CRISPR蛋白借用宿主烯醇化酶以阻止III型CRISPR免疫
Structure.abstract_cn: CRISPR（规律间隔成簇短回文重复序列）系统为抵御噬菌体感染提供了强大的适应性免疫。作为回应，噬菌体利用抗CRISPR (Acr) 蛋白来逃避CRISPR免疫。迄今为止发现的少数III型Acr蛋白在对抗III型免疫方面表现出条件性有效性，或者依赖于未知或知之甚少的抑制机制。在此，我们报道了AcrIIIA2的发现，这是一种由嗜热链球菌噬菌体编码的III-A型Acr蛋白。生化和结构分析揭示，噬菌体AcrIIIA2借用宿主烯醇化酶（一种高度丰富的糖酵解酶），与嗜热链球菌III-A型（Csm）CRISPR核糖核蛋白复合体形成三元复合体，从而阻碍其免疫反应。由烯醇化酶介导的AcrIIIA2阻断了噬菌体RNA结合的初始步骤，从而阻止了下游的III型抗噬菌体免疫反应。烯醇化酶通过充当必需的结构支架来参与抗免疫反应，稳定了Acr-CRISPR的相互作用。这些发现揭示了一种新的抗防御策略，该策略利用一个高度保守的宿主因子来阻断CRISPR免疫。嗜热链球菌噬菌体通过AcrIIIA2规避宿主CRISPR防御，AcrIIIA2与烯醇化酶（一种高度丰富的糖酵解酶）形成复合体，从而阻断噬菌体RNA结合。

Structure.title: Ca<sup>2+</sup>-driven PDIA6 biomolecular condensation ensures proinsulin folding
Structure.summary: Nature Cell Biology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41556-025-01794-8Lee et al. show that Ca²⁺ triggers condensates enriched with PDIA6, an ER-resident disulfide isomerase and chaperone, along with other protein disulfide isomerase family proteins and some chaperones that in turn enhance folding of proinsulin.
Structure.abstract: The endoplasmic reticulum (ER) plays crucial roles in maintaining protein quality control and regulating dynamic Ca2+ storage in eukaryotic cells. However, the proteostasis system involved in ER-mediated protein quality control has not been fully characterized. Here we show that Ca2+ triggers the condensation of PDIA6, an ER-resident disulfide isomerase and molecular chaperone, into quality control granules. In contrast to the condensation mechanism observed for proteins containing low-complexity domains, our results indicate that transient but specific electrostatic interactions occur between the first and the third folded thioredoxin-like domains of PDIA6. We further show that the PDIA6 condensates recruit proinsulin, thereby accelerating the oxidative proinsulin folding and suppressing the proinsulin aggregation inside quality control granules, essential for secretion of insulin. Lee et al. show that Ca²⁺ triggers condensates enriched with PDIA6, an ER-resident disulfide isomerase and chaperone, along with other protein disulfide isomerase family proteins and some chaperones that in turn enhance folding of proinsulin.

Structure.title_cn: 钙离子驱动的PDIA6生物分子凝聚确保胰岛素原折叠
Structure.abstract_cn: 内质网（ER）在维持真核细胞蛋白质质量控制和调节动态Ca2+储存中发挥着关键作用。然而，内质网介导的蛋白质质量控制所涉及的蛋白质稳态系统尚未被完全阐明。本研究表明，Ca2+触发了内质网驻留的二硫键异构酶和分子伴侣PDIA6的凝聚，形成质量控制颗粒。与含有低复杂性结构域的蛋白质的凝聚机制不同，我们的结果揭示了PDIA6的第一个和第三个折叠的硫氧还蛋白样结构域之间存在瞬态但特异性的静电相互作用。我们进一步发现，PDIA6凝聚体招募胰岛素原，从而加速胰岛素原的氧化折叠并抑制其在质量控制颗粒内的聚集，这对胰岛素的分泌至关重要。Lee等人指出，Ca²⁺触发了富含PDIA6（一种内质网驻留的二硫键异构酶和伴侣蛋白）以及其他蛋白质二硫键异构酶家族蛋白和一些伴侣蛋白的凝聚体，这些凝聚体进而增强了胰岛素原的折叠。

Structure.title: AlphaSync is an enhanced AlphaFold structure database synchronized with UniProt
Structure.summary: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41594-025-01719-xAlphaSync synchronizes AlphaFold Protein Structure Database predictions with UniProt sequences, providing up-to-date protein structures with residue-level annotations for humans, model organisms and pathogens through an accessible web interface and application programming interface.
Structure.abstract: Accurate prediction of protein structures is essential for understanding biological functions and guiding biomedical research. However, maintaining synchronization between structure models and rapidly expanding, continuously evolving protein sequence databases remains a major challenge. Here, we present AlphaSync ( alphasync.stjude.org ), a comprehensive resource that complements the AlphaFold Protein Structure Database. AlphaSync currently provides 2.6 million UniProt-synchronized structural models, including predictions for 40,016 updated proteins and isoforms from 925 species. AlphaSync achieves complete, up-to-date proteome coverage for 42 species, including humans, key pathogens and model organisms. It also provides residue-level annotations such as solvent accessibility, dihedral angles, intrinsic disorder status and over 4.7 billion atom-level noncovalent contacts. Its up-to-date structural models and detailed annotations will facilitate the study of protein structure–function relationships, assessment of sequence variants and machine learning tasks including protein design. With an intuitive web interface and application programming interface, AlphaSync enables protein research at scale and in detail. AlphaSync synchronizes AlphaFold Protein Structure Database predictions with UniProt sequences, providing up-to-date protein structures with residue-level annotations for humans, model organisms and pathogens through an accessible web interface and application programming interface.

Structure.title_cn: AlphaSync：一个与UniProt同步的增强型AlphaFold结构数据库
Structure.abstract_cn: 蛋白质结构准确预测对于理解生物功能和指导生物医学研究至关重要。然而，在结构模型与快速扩展、持续演进的蛋白质序列数据库之间保持同步仍然是一个重大挑战。在此，我们介绍了AlphaSync (alphasync.stjude.org)，这是一个补充AlphaFold蛋白质结构数据库的综合资源。AlphaSync目前提供了260万个与UniProt同步的结构模型，其中包括来自925个物种的40,016个更新蛋白质和异构体的预测。AlphaSync为包括人类、关键病原体和模式生物在内的42个物种提供了完整且最新的蛋白质组覆盖。它还提供了残基水平的注释，例如溶剂可及性、二面角、内在无序状态以及超过47亿个原子水平的非共价接触。其最新的结构模型和详细注释将促进蛋白质结构-功能关系的研究、序列变异的评估以及包括蛋白质设计在内的机器学习任务。凭借直观的网络界面和应用程序编程接口，AlphaSync能够大规模、详细地开展蛋白质研究。AlphaSync通过可访问的网络界面和应用程序编程接口，将AlphaFold蛋白质结构数据库的预测与UniProt序列同步，为人类、模式生物和病原体提供带有残基水平注释的最新蛋白质结构。

Structure.title: Zero-shot segmentation using embeddings from a protein language model identifies functional regions in the human proteome
Structure.summary: by Ami G. Sangster, Cameron Dufault, Haoning Qu, Denise Le, Julie D. Forman-Kay, Alan M. MosesThe biological function of a protein is often determined by its distinct functional units, such as folded domains and intrinsically disordered regions. Identifying and categorizing these protein segments from sequence has been a major focus in computational biology which has enabled the automatic annotation of folded protein domains. Here we show that embeddings from the unsupervised protein language model ProtT5 can be used to identify and categorize protein segments without relying on conserved patterns in primary amino acid sequence. We present Zero-shot Protein Segmentation (ZPS), where we use embeddings from ProtT5 to predict the boundaries of protein segments without training or fine-tuning any parameters. We find that ZPS boundary predictions for the human proteome are better at reproducing reviewed annotations from UniProt than established bioinformatics tools and ProtT5 embeddings of ZPS segments can categorize over 200 of the most common UniProt annotations in the human proteome, including folded domains, sub-domains, and intrinsically disordered regions. To explore ZPS predictions, we introduce a new way to visualize protein embeddings that closely resembles diagrams of distinct functional units in protein biology. Since ZPS and segment embeddings can be used without training or fine-tuning, the approach is not biased towards known annotations and can be used to identify and categorize unannotated protein segments. We used the segment embeddings to identify unannotated mitochondrion targeting signals and SYGQ-rich prion-like domains, which are functional regions within intrinsically disordered regions. We expect that the analysis of protein segment embedding similarity can lead to valuable information about protein function, including about intrinsically disordered regions and poorly understood protein regions.

Structure.title_cn: 基于蛋白质语言模型嵌入的零样本分割识别人类蛋白质组中的功能区域
Structure.abstract_cn: 蛋白质的生物学功能通常由其独特的结构单元决定，例如折叠结构域和内在无序区。从序列中识别和分类这些蛋白质片段一直是计算生物学的一个主要焦点，这使得折叠蛋白质结构域的自动注释成为可能。在此，我们展示了无监督蛋白质语言模型ProtT5的嵌入可用于识别和分类蛋白质片段，而无需依赖一级氨基酸序列中的保守模式。我们提出了零样本蛋白质分割（ZPS）方法，该方法利用ProtT5的嵌入来预测蛋白质片段的边界，而无需进行任何参数的训练或微调。我们发现，ZPS对人类蛋白质组的边界预测在重现UniProt中经过评审的注释方面优于已有的生物信息学工具，并且ZPS片段的ProtT5嵌入可以对人类蛋白质组中200多种最常见的UniProt注释进行分类，包括折叠结构域、亚结构域和内在无序区。为了探索ZPS的预测结果，我们引入了一种新的蛋白质嵌入可视化方法，该方法与蛋白质生物学中不同功能单元的图示非常相似。由于ZPS和片段嵌入无需训练或微调即可使用，因此该方法不会偏向于已知注释，可用于识别和分类未注释的蛋白质片段。我们利用这些片段嵌入识别了未注释的线粒体靶向信号和富含SYGQ的朊病毒样结构域，它们是内在无序区内的功能区域。我们预计，对蛋白质片段嵌入相似性的分析可以为蛋白质功能提供有价值的信息，包括关于内在无序区和了解不足的蛋白质区域的信息。

Consequently, we achieve tandem perovskite LEDs with a low turn-on voltage of 3.2 V, a high peak external quantum efficiency (EQE) of 45.5% (even 20% higher than the sum of peak EQEs of single-unit devices), an average peak EQE of 40.9%, and a half-lifetime of 64 h at an initial radiance of 70 W Sr−1 m−2. These findings represent a significant advancement in achieving high-performance and multicolor LEDs through the stacking of perovskite LEDs.

Molecular Design.title_cn: 通过层间光子再循环实现高性能叠层钙钛矿发光二极管
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 叠层发光二极管（LED）通过将多个发光单元垂直串联堆叠，以结合单个发光元件的亮度，与单单元器件相比，能有效提高效率和寿命1-3。特别是，叠层钙钛矿LED受益于钙钛矿材料小的斯托克斯位移4，这原则上可以实现单个钙钛矿层之间显著的光子再循环，并增强对陷阱模式光的提取。然而，如何构建一种能有效融合各个钙钛矿单元亮度的叠层结构，仍然是一个重大挑战。在此，我们通过结合两个溶液处理的钙钛矿发光单元，展示了高效稳定的叠层LED。这种叠层结构有效结合了每个发光单元的原始亮度；我们认为，通过单个发光单元之间的光子再循环，发光强度也得到了显著增强。因此，我们实现了具有低启亮电压3.2 V、高峰值外量子效率（EQE）45.5%（甚至比单单元器件的峰值EQE总和高出20%）、平均峰值EQE 40.9%，以及在初始辐射亮度为70 W Sr−1 m−2下半衰期达64小时的叠层钙钛矿LED。这些发现代表了通过钙钛矿LED堆叠实现高性能和多色LED的重大进展。

Molecular Design.title: CO<sub>2</sub>-triggered reversible transformation of soft elastomers into rigid and highly fluorescent plastics
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-65495-4Carbon dioxide responsive polymers are promising for smart technologies, though it is challenging to effectively regulate these properties reliably. Here the authors report an elastomer composed of polyethyleneimine and polydimethylsiloxane which can reversibly its Young’s modulus responding to carbon dioxide.
Molecular Design.abstract: Polymers that alter their properties and functions in response to carbon dioxide (CO2) exposure offer significant potential for the development of smart technologies and innovative CO2 utilization approaches. Nonetheless, effectively regulating the behavior of solid-state polymers using CO2 remains a considerable challenge, highlighting the need for robust and reliable strategies to address this issue. This study presents elastomers that feature nanophase-separated morphologies composed of CO2-vitrifiable polyethyleneimine and CO2-permeable polydimethylsiloxane components. The elastomers (Young’s modulus (E) of approximately 1 MPa) reversibly transform into hard plastics (E > 2 GPa) in the presence of CO2. In addition to bulk stiffening, their surface adhesion and friction rapidly shift, and the material’s fluorescence is significantly amplified. Here, we show that these multifunctional responses to CO2 position the materials as innovative platforms for responsive mechanical systems and CO2-activated optical devices, with potential applications in sensing, display, and data storage technologies. Carbon dioxide responsive polymers are promising for smart technologies, though it is challenging to effectively regulate these properties reliably. Here the authors report an elastomer composed of polyethyleneimine and polydimethylsiloxane which can reversibly its Young’s modulus responding to carbon dioxide.
Molecular Design.authors_short: Miwa, Yohei et al., Kutsumizu, Shoichi
Molecular Design.title_cn: CO₂触发的软弹性体向刚性高荧光塑料的可逆转化
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 聚合物在暴露于二氧化碳(CO₂)时能改变其性质和功能，这为智能技术和创新的CO₂利用方法的发展提供了巨大潜力。然而，利用CO₂有效调控固态聚合物的行为仍然是一个重大挑战，这凸显了开发稳健可靠策略来解决这一问题的必要性。本研究介绍了一种弹性体，其具有纳米相分离形貌，由CO₂可玻璃化的聚乙烯亚胺和CO₂可渗透的聚二甲基硅氧烷组分构成。在CO₂存在下，这些弹性体（杨氏模量(E)约为1 MPa）可逆地转化为硬塑料（E > 2 GPa）。除了整体刚度增加外，其表面粘附性和摩擦力也迅速改变，并且材料的荧光显著增强。我们在此展示，这些对CO₂的多功能响应使该材料成为响应式机械系统和CO₂激活光学器件的创新平台，在传感、显示和数据存储技术中具有潜在应用。二氧化碳响应性聚合物在智能技术中前景广阔，但有效且可靠地调控其性能仍具挑战。本文作者报道了一种由聚乙烯亚胺和聚二甲基硅氧烷组成的弹性体，其杨氏模量可随二氧化碳响应而可逆变化。

Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 迄今为止，在活细胞中以膜小叶特异性分辨率研究脂质组成的方法一直缺乏。一种名为荧光原激活偶遇传感（FACES）的新方法，将生物正交代谢标记与靶向细胞器的荧光原激活蛋白相结合，从而能够在任何细胞器中选择性地可视化目标膜小叶上的脂质。

Molecular Design.title: AlphaSync is an enhanced AlphaFold structure database synchronized with UniProt
Molecular Design.summary: Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41594-025-01719-xAlphaSync synchronizes AlphaFold Protein Structure Database predictions with UniProt sequences, providing up-to-date protein structures with residue-level annotations for humans, model organisms and pathogens through an accessible web interface and application programming interface.
Molecular Design.abstract: Accurate prediction of protein structures is essential for understanding biological functions and guiding biomedical research. However, maintaining synchronization between structure models and rapidly expanding, continuously evolving protein sequence databases remains a major challenge. Here, we present AlphaSync ( alphasync.stjude.org ), a comprehensive resource that complements the AlphaFold Protein Structure Database. AlphaSync currently provides 2.6 million UniProt-synchronized structural models, including predictions for 40,016 updated proteins and isoforms from 925 species. AlphaSync achieves complete, up-to-date proteome coverage for 42 species, including humans, key pathogens and model organisms. It also provides residue-level annotations such as solvent accessibility, dihedral angles, intrinsic disorder status and over 4.7 billion atom-level noncovalent contacts. Its up-to-date structural models and detailed annotations will facilitate the study of protein structure–function relationships, assessment of sequence variants and machine learning tasks including protein design. With an intuitive web interface and application programming interface, AlphaSync enables protein research at scale and in detail. AlphaSync synchronizes AlphaFold Protein Structure Database predictions with UniProt sequences, providing up-to-date protein structures with residue-level annotations for humans, model organisms and pathogens through an accessible web interface and application programming interface.

Molecular Design.title_cn: AlphaSync：一个与UniProt同步的增强型AlphaFold结构数据库
Molecular Design.abstract_cn: 蛋白质结构准确预测对于理解生物功能和指导生物医学研究至关重要。然而，在结构模型与快速扩展、持续演进的蛋白质序列数据库之间保持同步仍然是一个重大挑战。在此，我们介绍了AlphaSync (alphasync.stjude.org)，这是一个补充AlphaFold蛋白质结构数据库的综合资源。AlphaSync目前提供了260万个与UniProt同步的结构模型，其中包括来自925个物种的40,016个更新蛋白质和异构体的预测。AlphaSync为包括人类、关键病原体和模式生物在内的42个物种提供了完整且最新的蛋白质组覆盖。它还提供了残基水平的注释，例如溶剂可及性、二面角、内在无序状态以及超过47亿个原子水平的非共价接触。其最新的结构模型和详细注释将促进蛋白质结构-功能关系的研究、序列变异的评估以及包括蛋白质设计在内的机器学习任务。凭借直观的网络界面和应用程序编程接口，AlphaSync能够大规模、详细地开展蛋白质研究。AlphaSync通过可访问的网络界面和应用程序编程接口，将AlphaFold蛋白质结构数据库的预测与UniProt序列同步，为人类、模式生物和病原体提供带有残基水平注释的最新蛋白质结构。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Stable clonal contribution of lineage-restricted stem cells to human hematopoiesis
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Genetics, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41588-025-02405-wThis study uses somatic mutations as a natural barcoding system to retrospectively and prospectively trace the fate of hematopoietic stem cells across all major blood cell lineages in healthy aged individuals. It reveals the existence of intrinsically fate-biased hematopoietic stem cells in native human hematopoiesis, validated by transplantation assays.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Dynamic steady-state lineage contribution of human hematopoietic stem cell (HSC) clones needs to be assessed over time. However, clonal contribution of HSCs has only been investigated at single time points and without assessing the critical erythroid and platelet lineages. Here we screened for somatic mutations in healthy aged individuals, identifying expanded HSC clones accessible for lineage tracing of all major blood cell lineages. In addition to HSC clones with balanced contribution to all lineages, we identified clones with all myeloid lineages but no or few B and T lymphocytes or all myeloid lineages and B cells but no T cells. No other lineage restriction patterns were reproducibly observed. Retrospective phylogenetic inferences uncovered a ‘hierarchical’ pattern of descendant subclones more lineage biased than their ancestral clone and a more common ‘stable’ pattern with descendant subclones showing highly concordant lineage contributions with their ancestral clone, despite decades of separation. Prospective lineage tracing confirmed remarkable stability over years of HSC clones with distinct lineage replenishment patterns. This study uses somatic mutations as a natural barcoding system to retrospectively and prospectively trace the fate of hematopoietic stem cells across all major blood cell lineages in healthy aged individuals. It reveals the existence of intrinsically fate-biased hematopoietic stem cells in native human hematopoiesis, validated by transplantation assays.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Yoshizato, Tetsuichi et al., Jacobsen, Sten Eirik W.
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 谱系受限干细胞对人类造血的稳定克隆贡献
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 人类造血干细胞（HSC）克隆的动态稳态谱系贡献需要随时间进行评估。然而，HSC的克隆贡献此前仅在单一时间点进行过研究，并且未能评估关键的红系和血小板谱系。本研究筛查了健康老年个体中的体细胞突变，从而识别出可用于追踪所有主要血细胞谱系的扩增HSC克隆。除了对所有谱系均有平衡贡献的HSC克隆外，我们还发现了一些克隆，它们对所有髓系谱系均有贡献，但B和T淋巴细胞缺失或极少，或者对所有髓系谱系和B细胞有贡献但T细胞缺失。未观察到其他可重复的谱系限制模式。回顾性系统发育推断揭示了两种模式：一种是“分层”模式，其中子代亚克隆比其祖代克隆表现出更强的谱系偏向性；另一种更常见的“稳定”模式，其中子代亚克隆尽管经过数十年的分离，但与祖代克隆表现出高度一致的谱系贡献。前瞻性谱系追踪证实了具有不同谱系补充模式的HSC克隆在多年内的显著稳定性。本研究利用体细胞突变作为一种天然条形码系统，回顾性地和前瞻性地追踪了健康老年个体中造血干细胞在所有主要血细胞谱系中的命运。它揭示了在天然人类造血过程中存在内在命运偏向的造血干细胞，并通过移植实验得到了验证。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Dynamic dosage changes in X-linked transposable elements during mammalian dosage compensation
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64865-2X-chromosome dosage compensation involves inactivation and hyperactivation, but the role of transposable elements is unclear. Here, the authors show that X-linked repeats are differentially silenced during inactivation but do not undergo hyperactivation.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: In mammals, X-linked dosage compensation involves X-chromosome inactivation to balance X chromosome dosage between males and females, and hyperactivation of the remaining X-chromosome (Xa-hyperactivation) to achieve X-autosome balance in both sexes. Studies of both processes have largely focused on coding genes and have not accounted for transposable elements which comprise 50% of the X-chromosome with numerous epigenetic functions. Here we develop a new bioinformatic pipeline tailored to repetitive elements with capability for allelic discrimination. We then apply the pipeline to our recent So-Smart-Seq analysis of single embryos to comprehensively interrogate whether X-linked transposable elements are subject to either X-chromosome inactivation or Xa-hyperactivation. We observe significant differences in repeat silencing in parentally driven “imprinted” versus zygotically driven “random” X-chromosome inactivation. Chromosomal positioning, genetic background and evolutionary age impact their silencing. In contrast, transposable elements do not undergo Xa-hyperactivation. Evolutionary and functional implications are discussed. X-chromosome dosage compensation involves inactivation and hyperactivation, but the role of transposable elements is unclear. Here, the authors show that X-linked repeats are differentially silenced during inactivation but do not undergo hyperactivation.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Wei, Chunyao et al., Lee, Jeannie T.
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 哺乳动物剂量补偿过程中X连锁转座元件的动态剂量变化
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 在哺乳动物中，X连锁剂量补偿涉及X染色体失活以平衡雄性和雌性之间的X染色体剂量，以及剩余X染色体的超激活（Xa超激活）以在两性中实现X-常染色体平衡。对这两种过程的研究主要集中在编码基因上，而未考虑占X染色体50%并具有多种表观遗传功能的转座元件。在本研究中，我们开发了一种针对重复元件的新型生物信息学流程，该流程具有等位基因区分能力。随后，我们将该流程应用于我们近期对单胚胎进行的So-Smart-Seq分析，以全面探究X连锁转座元件是否受到X染色体失活或Xa超激活的影响。我们观察到，在亲本驱动的“印记”与合子驱动的“随机”X染色体失活过程中，重复序列的沉默存在显著差异。染色体定位、遗传背景和进化年龄均影响其沉默。相比之下，转座元件不经历Xa超激活。本文讨论了其进化和功能意义。尽管X染色体剂量补偿涉及失活和超激活，但转座元件在其中的作用尚不明确。本研究揭示，X连锁重复序列在失活过程中表现出差异性沉默，但不经历超激活。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Evolutionary characterization of antiviral SAMD9/9L across kingdoms supports ancient convergence and lineage-specific adaptations
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Ecology & Evolution, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41559-025-02845-xA search for analogues of the human SAMD9/9L antiviral genes identifies convergent evolution of this gene family in the bacterial and animal kingdoms, with species-specific and recent genomic signatures indicative of adaptations resulting from evolutionary arms races with viruses.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: Human SAMD9 and SAMD9L are duplicated genes that encode innate immune proteins restricting poxviruses and lentiviruses, such as human immunodeficiency virus (HIV). Mutations in these genes are implicated in genetic diseases and cancer. Here we combined structural similarity searches, phylogenetics and population genomics with experimental assays of SAMD9/9L functions to resolve the evolutionary and functional dynamics of these immune proteins, spanning from prokaryotes to primates. We discovered structural analogues of SAMD9/9L in the antibacteriophage defence system, Avs, resulting from convergent evolution. Further, the predicted nuclease site was conserved in bacterial analogues and was essential for cell death, suggesting a fundamental role in defence across different life kingdoms. Despite this shared immunity, we identified genomic signatures of evolutionary arms races in mammals, with remarkable gene copy number variations. We further unveiled that the absence of SAMD9 in bonobos corresponds to a recent gene loss still segregating in the population. Finally, we found that chimpanzee and bonobo SAMD9Ls have enhanced anti-HIV-1 functions compared with the human orthologue. These SAMD9/9L adaptations probably resulted from strong viral selective pressures, including by lentiviruses, and could contribute to lentiviral resistance in bonobos. Evolutionary characterization of Avs9 and SAMD9/9L provides a deeper understanding of how the immune system adapts to fight viruses over billions of years of evolution. A search for analogues of the human SAMD9/9L antiviral genes identifies convergent evolution of this gene family in the bacterial and animal kingdoms, with species-specific and recent genomic signatures indicative of adaptations resulting from evolutionary arms races with viruses.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Legrand, Alexandre et al., Etienne, Lucie
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: 抗病毒SAMD9/9L跨界进化表征揭示古老趋同进化与谱系特异性适应
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 人类SAMD9和SAMD9L是重复基因，编码限制痘病毒和慢病毒（如人类免疫缺陷病毒（HIV））的先天免疫蛋白。这些基因的突变与遗传疾病和癌症有关。本研究结合结构相似性搜索、系统发育学、群体基因组学以及SAMD9/9L功能的实验分析，解析了这些免疫蛋白从原核生物到灵长类动物的进化和功能动态。我们发现，在抗噬菌体防御系统Avs中存在SAMD9/9L的结构同源物，这是趋同进化的结果。此外，预测的核酸酶位点在细菌同源物中是保守的，并且对细胞死亡至关重要，这表明其在不同生命界别的防御中具有基础性作用。尽管存在这种共享免疫性，我们仍在哺乳动物中发现了进化军备竞赛的基因组特征，并伴有显著的基因拷贝数变异。我们进一步揭示，倭黑猩猩中SAMD9的缺失对应着群体中仍在分离的近期基因丢失事件。最后，我们发现黑猩猩和倭黑猩猩的SAMD9L与人类直系同源物相比，具有增强的抗HIV-1功能。这些SAMD9/9L的适应性可能源于强大的病毒选择压力，包括慢病毒，并可能有助于倭黑猩猩对慢病毒的抵抗力。Avs9和SAMD9/9L的进化表征为深入理解免疫系统如何在数十亿年的进化中适应并对抗病毒提供了基础。对人类SAMD9/9L抗病毒基因同源物的搜索揭示了该基因家族在细菌界和动物界中的趋同进化，并伴有物种特异性和近期基因组特征，这些特征表明了与病毒进行进化军备竞赛所产生的适应性。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: Reprogramming of H3K36me2 guides lineage-specific post-implantation de novo DNA methylation
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: Nature Cell Biology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41556-025-01805-8Lu, Wang et al. profile H3K36me2 throughout oocyte-to-embryo transition, pre-implantation and early post-implantation development and report a role for H3K36me2 in post-implantation embryos to re-establish lineage-specific DNA methylation.
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract: In mammals, DNA methylation is re-established after implantation following post-fertilization global erasure. Yet, the underlying mechanism remains elusive. Here we investigate H3K36me2 reprogramming in mouse early development and its role in post-implantation DNA methylation re-establishment. In oocytes, H3K36me2 accumulates in gene bodies upon transcription silencing and partially persists to the eight-cell stage. De novo H3K36me2 occurs at enhancers after zygotic genome activation, before spreading genome-wide after implantation, except on the inactive X chromosome. Mutation of the H3K36me2 methyltransferase NSD1 compromises global DNA methylation after implantation preferentially in extra-embryonic lineages and that at methylation-prone promoters, including those of germline-specific genes. However, DNA methylation establishment partially bypasses H3K36me2 through upregulated DNMT3B, a ‘leaky’ H3K36me2/3 reader. This contrasts with DNMT3A, which strictly requires H3K36me2/3 for DNA methylation through its PWWP domain. Finally, DNA methylation valleys escape de novo DNA methylation via PRC1/H2AK119ub1-mediated H3K36me2 exclusion. Thus, H3K36me2 reprogramming regulates lineage- and locus-specific post-implantation DNA methylation establishment. Lu, Wang et al. profile H3K36me2 throughout oocyte-to-embryo transition, pre-implantation and early post-implantation development and report a role for H3K36me2 in post-implantation embryos to re-establish lineage-specific DNA methylation.
Genetics & Epigenetics.authors_short: Lu, Xukun et al., Xie, Wei
Genetics & Epigenetics.title_cn: H3K36me2重编程引导谱系特异性着床后从头DNA甲基化
Genetics & Epigenetics.abstract_cn: 在哺乳动物中，DNA甲基化在受精后经历全局擦除，并在着床后重新建立。然而，其潜在机制仍不清楚。本研究探讨了小鼠早期发育过程中H3K36me2的重编程及其在着床后DNA甲基化重建中的作用。在卵母细胞中，H3K36me2在转录沉默后积累于基因体，并部分持续到八细胞阶段。受精卵基因组激活后，从头H3K36me2在增强子处发生，随后在着床后全基因组扩散，但失活X染色体除外。H3K36me2甲基转移酶NSD1的突变损害了着床后全局DNA甲基化，尤其是在胚外谱系和易甲基化启动子（包括生殖系特异性基因的启动子）处。然而，DNA甲基化的建立通过上调的DNMT3B（一种“泄漏型”H3K36me2/3读取器）部分绕过了H3K36me2。这与DNMT3A形成对比，后者通过其PWWP结构域严格依赖H3K36me2/3进行DNA甲基化。最后，DNA甲基化谷通过PRC1/H2AK119ub1介导的H3K36me2排斥作用逃避了从头DNA甲基化。因此，H3K36me2重编程调控着谱系和位点特异性的着床后DNA甲基化建立。Lu, Wang等人描绘了H3K36me2在卵母细胞到胚胎转变、着床前和着床后早期发育过程中的图谱，并揭示了H3K36me2在着床后胚胎中重建谱系特异性DNA甲基化中的作用。

Genetics & Epigenetics.title: IPScan: Detecting novel intronic PolyAdenylation events with RNA-seq data
Genetics & Epigenetics.summary: by Naima Ahmed Fahmi, Sze Cheng, Jeovani Overstreet, Qianqian Song, Jeongsik Yong, Wei ZhangIntronic PolyAdenylation (IPA) is an important post-transcriptional mechanism that can alter transcript coding potential by truncating translation regions, thereby increasing transcriptome and proteome diversity. This process generates novel protein isoforms with altered peptide sequences, some of which are implicated in disease progression, including cancer. Truncated proteins may lose tumor-suppressive functions, contributing to oncogenesis. Single-cell & Spatial omics.title: Multimodal learning enables chat-based exploration of single-cell data
Single-cell & Spatial omics.summary: Nature Biotechnology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41587-025-02857-9CellWhisperer uses multimodal learning of transcriptomes and text to answer questions about single-cell RNA-sequencing data.
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract: Single-cell sequencing characterizes biological samples at unprecedented scale and detail, but data interpretation remains challenging. Here, we present CellWhisperer, an artificial intelligence (AI) model and software tool for chat-based interrogation of gene expression. We establish a multimodal embedding of transcriptomes and their textual annotations, using contrastive learning on 1 million RNA sequencing profiles with AI-curated descriptions. We benchmark CellWhisperer’s performance for zero-shot prediction of cell types and other biological annotations and demonstrate its use for biological discovery in a meta-analysis of human embryonic development. We integrate a CellWhisperer chat box with the CELLxGENE browser, allowing users to interactively explore gene expression through a combined graphical and chat interface. In summary, CellWhisperer leverages large community-scale data repositories to connect transcriptomes and text, thereby enabling interactive exploration of single-cell RNA-sequencing data with natural-language chats. Single-cell & Spatial omics.title: Dynamic dosage changes in X-linked transposable elements during mammalian dosage compensation

Chromosomal positioning, genetic background and evolutionary age impact their silencing. In contrast, transposable elements do not undergo Xa-hyperactivation. Single-cell & Spatial omics.title_cn: 哺乳动物剂量补偿过程中X连锁转座元件的动态剂量变化

Single-cell & Spatial omics.summary: Nature Ecology & Evolution, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41559-025-02883-5Seahorses have a unique sex role reversal with male pregnancy involving the brood pouch, an evolutionarily novel organ. This study uses single-cell genomics and in vivo experiments to reveal the cellular basis and molecular mechanism of pouch development and diversity in seahorses.

Single-cell & Spatial omics.title_cn: 海马雄性妊娠的细胞与分子机制
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract_cn: 海马及其近亲（海龙科鱼类）展现出独特的性别角色逆转现象。其雄性妊娠由一个进化上新颖的器官——育儿袋——所促成。尽管育儿袋起源于完全不同的组织，但其功能与哺乳动物的子宫和胎盘类似。本研究利用比较单细胞多组学和基因组学分析，探讨了海龙科鱼类进化过程中从产卵到妊娠的转变，并将其趋同进化的胎盘式亲代抚育与哺乳动物进行了比较。体内实验表明，一群具有育儿袋诱导潜能并表达雄激素（而非其他胎生动物中的雌激素）的上皮祖细胞，能够触发育儿袋的发生。两种机制确保了育儿袋的功能性：一是招募与假胎盘相关的细胞，这些细胞的特征是表达在哺乳动物子宫中也发现的直系同源基因；二是协同利用特定细胞，使粘性卵附着在雄性特化的皮肤斑块上，这些斑块表达海马特有的新基因，如pastns和syn-lectins。这些机制共同推动了海龙科鱼类育儿袋的多样性和复杂性。本研究通过单细胞基因组学和体内实验，揭示了海马育儿袋发育和多样性的细胞基础和分子机制。

Single-cell & Spatial omics.title: Single-cell analysis reveals cell death as driver of NLRP3-mediated secretion of IL-1β in human monocytes

Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract: Interleukin-1β (IL-1β) is a key proinflammatory cytokine with critical roles in infections and inflammatory diseases, yet the mechanisms regulating its release from human monocytes remain unclear. Instead, a small subset (5–10%) undergoing canonical NLRP3 inflammasome activation and GSDMD-dependent pyroptosis produced the majority of secreted IL-1β, with a smaller contribution from apoptotic cells transitioning to secondary necrosis. Single-cell profiling of CD14+ monocytes from patients with cryopyrin-associated periodic syndrome confirmed lytic cell death as the driver of pathological IL-1β release. These findings redefine IL-1β as a damage-associated molecular pattern, secreted predominantly by dying monocytes. Lamkanfi, Shirasaki, Izawa and colleagues show that IL-1β release in human monocytes stimulated with lipopolysaccharide or carrying NLRP3 activatory mutations is mostly restricted to cells undergoing lytic cell death.

Single-cell & Spatial omics.title_cn: 单细胞分析揭示细胞死亡是人单核细胞中NLRP3介导的IL-1β分泌的驱动因素
Single-cell & Spatial omics.abstract_cn: 白细胞介素-1β (IL-1β) 是一种关键的促炎细胞因子，在感染和炎症性疾病中发挥着重要作用，然而，其从人单核细胞中释放的调控机制仍不清楚。本研究中，我们采用了一系列单细胞方法，包括分泌和细胞命运的整合活细胞成像、流式细胞术和高内涵成像，以研究脂多糖刺激的原代人外周血CD14+单核细胞中IL-1β的分泌动态。我们发现显著的异质性：大部分细胞保持活力，对IL-1β分泌的贡献微乎其微，这挑战了既有的模型。相反，一小部分（5-10%）经历经典NLRP3炎性体激活和GSDMD依赖性细胞焦亡的细胞产生了大部分分泌的IL-1β，而从凋亡细胞向继发性坏死转变的细胞贡献较小。对冷吡啉相关周期综合征患者CD14+单核细胞的单细胞分析证实，裂解性细胞死亡是病理性IL-1β释放的驱动因素。这些发现将IL-1β重新定义为一种损伤相关分子模式，主要由垂死的单核细胞分泌。Lamkanfi、Shirasaki、Izawa及其同事的研究表明，在脂多糖刺激或携带NLRP3激活突变的人单核细胞中，IL-1β的释放主要局限于经历裂解性细胞死亡的细胞。

Development.title: Reprogramming of H3K36me2 guides lineage-specific post-implantation de novo DNA methylation
Development.summary: Nature Cell Biology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41556-025-01805-8Lu, Wang et al. profile H3K36me2 throughout oocyte-to-embryo transition, pre-implantation and early post-implantation development and report a role for H3K36me2 in post-implantation embryos to re-establish lineage-specific DNA methylation.

Mutation of the H3K36me2 methyltransferase NSD1 compromises global DNA methylation after implantation preferentially in extra-embryonic lineages and that at methylation-prone promoters, including those of germline-specific genes. However, DNA methylation establishment partially bypasses H3K36me2 through upregulated DNMT3B, a ‘leaky’ H3K36me2/3 reader. This contrasts with DNMT3A, which strictly requires H3K36me2/3 for DNA methylation through its PWWP domain. Finally, DNA methylation valleys escape de novo DNA methylation via PRC1/H2AK119ub1-mediated H3K36me2 exclusion. Thus, H3K36me2 reprogramming regulates lineage- and locus-specific post-implantation DNA methylation establishment. Development.authors_short: Lu, Xukun et al., Xie, Wei
Development.title_cn: H3K36me2重编程引导谱系特异性着床后从头DNA甲基化
Development.abstract_cn: 在哺乳动物中，DNA甲基化在受精后经历全局擦除，并在着床后重新建立。然而，其潜在机制仍不清楚。本研究探讨了小鼠早期发育过程中H3K36me2的重编程及其在着床后DNA甲基化重建中的作用。在卵母细胞中，H3K36me2在转录沉默后积累于基因体，并部分持续到八细胞阶段。受精卵基因组激活后，从头H3K36me2在增强子处发生，随后在着床后全基因组扩散，但失活X染色体除外。H3K36me2甲基转移酶NSD1的突变损害了着床后全局DNA甲基化，尤其是在胚外谱系和易甲基化启动子（包括生殖系特异性基因的启动子）处。然而，DNA甲基化的建立通过上调的DNMT3B（一种“泄漏型”H3K36me2/3读取器）部分绕过了H3K36me2。这与DNMT3A形成对比，后者通过其PWWP结构域严格依赖H3K36me2/3进行DNA甲基化。最后，DNA甲基化谷通过PRC1/H2AK119ub1介导的H3K36me2排斥作用逃避了从头DNA甲基化。因此，H3K36me2重编程调控着谱系和位点特异性的着床后DNA甲基化建立。Lu, Wang等人描绘了H3K36me2在卵母细胞到胚胎转变、着床前和着床后早期发育过程中的图谱，并揭示了H3K36me2在着床后胚胎中重建谱系特异性DNA甲基化中的作用。

Cancer.title: Wild-type KRAS activation drives evasion of interferon-mediated immunity and resistance to immunotherapy in hepatocellular carcinoma
Cancer.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64860-7Increasing evidence suggests that activation of oncogenic pathways contributes to an unfavorable tumor microenvironment. Here, the authors show that wild-type KRAS plays a key role in immune evasion in hepatocellular carcinoma by impairing interferon-mediated immunity and promoting resistance to immunotherapy via the EGFR/MEK/ERK pathway.
Cancer.abstract: Increasing evidence indicates that activation of oncogenic pathways contributes to an unfavourable tumour immune microenvironment (TIME), ultimately resulting in resistance to immunotherapy. Here, we aim to identify a critical oncogenic pathway involved in an antigen-expressing c-MYC-lucOSOE/Tp53KO hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) mouse model that simulates immune response against tumour-associated antigens. Using data-independent acquisition proteomics, we reveal the role of wild-type KRAS in immune escaped mouse HCC tumours, with EGF concurrently activating EGFR/MEK/ERK signalling. We observe KRAS activation in HCC patients who received immune checkpoint inhibitor (ICI) treatments, where it correlates with poor clinical outcomes. Notably, combination therapy with SOS1 inhibitor MRTX0902, Trametinib, and anti-PD-1 antibody effectively increased intratumoural CD8+ T cell infiltration and improved survival. Our study thus reveals that targeting wild-type KRAS signalling in combination with ICIs may serve as an effective treatment strategy for advanced HCC patients. Increasing evidence suggests that activation of oncogenic pathways contributes to an unfavorable tumor microenvironment. Here, the authors show that wild-type KRAS plays a key role in immune evasion in hepatocellular carcinoma by impairing interferon-mediated immunity and promoting resistance to immunotherapy via the EGFR/MEK/ERK pathway.

Cancer.title_cn: 野生型KRAS激活驱动肝细胞癌中干扰素介导的免疫逃逸及免疫治疗抵抗
Cancer.abstract_cn: 越来越多的证据表明，致癌通路激活导致不利的肿瘤免疫微环境（TIME），最终引发对免疫治疗的抵抗。本研究旨在识别一个在表达抗原的c-MYC-lucOSOE/Tp53KO肝细胞癌（HCC）小鼠模型中涉及的关键致癌通路，该模型模拟了针对肿瘤相关抗原的免疫反应。利用数据非依赖性采集蛋白质组学，我们揭示了野生型KRAS在免疫逃逸的小鼠HCC肿瘤中的作用，其中表皮生长因子（EGF）同时激活EGFR/MEK/ERK信号通路。单细胞RNA测序数据分析显示，KRAS信号通路通过EGFR/MEK/ERK通路抑制CXCL9，从而内在性地抑制干扰素介导的MHC-I表达，并外在性地损害CD8+ T细胞活性。我们在接受免疫检查点抑制剂（ICI）治疗的HCC患者中观察到KRAS激活，且其与不良临床预后相关。值得注意的是，SOS1抑制剂MRTX0902、曲美替尼（Trametinib）和抗PD-1抗体的联合治疗有效增加了肿瘤内CD8+ T细胞浸润并改善了生存。因此，我们的研究揭示，靶向野生型KRAS信号通路与ICI联合可能成为晚期HCC患者的有效治疗策略。越来越多的证据表明，致癌通路激活导致不利的肿瘤微环境。在此，作者们表明野生型KRAS通过损害干扰素介导的免疫并经由EGFR/MEK/ERK通路促进对免疫治疗的抵抗，从而在肝细胞癌的免疫逃逸中发挥关键作用。

Cancer.title: IPScan: Detecting novel intronic PolyAdenylation events with RNA-seq data
Cancer.summary: by Naima Ahmed Fahmi, Sze Cheng, Jeovani Overstreet, Qianqian Song, Jeongsik Yong, Wei ZhangIntronic PolyAdenylation (IPA) is an important post-transcriptional mechanism that can alter transcript coding potential by truncating translation regions, thereby increasing transcriptome and proteome diversity. This process generates novel protein isoforms with altered peptide sequences, some of which are implicated in disease progression, including cancer. Truncated proteins may lose tumor-suppressive functions, contributing to oncogenesis. Despite advancements in Alternative PolyAdenylation (APA) analysis using RNA-seq, detecting and quantifying novel IPA events remains challenging. To address this, we developed IPScan, a computational pipeline for precise IPA event identification, quantification, and visualization. IPScan has been benchmarked against existing methods using simulated data, different human and mouse cell lines, and TCGA (The Cancer Genome Atlas) breast cancer datasets. Differential IPA events under different biological conditions were quantified and validated via qPCR.

Cancer.title_cn: IPScan：基于RNA测序数据检测新型内含子多聚腺苷酸化事件
Cancer.abstract_cn: 内含子多聚腺苷酸化 (IPA) 是一种重要的转录后机制，它通过截短翻译区域来改变转录本的编码潜力，从而增加转录组和蛋白质组的多样性。该过程产生具有改变肽序列的新型蛋白质异构体，其中一些与疾病进展（包括癌症）有关。截短的蛋白质可能丧失肿瘤抑制功能，从而促进肿瘤发生。尽管利用RNA测序进行选择性多聚腺苷酸化 (APA) 分析取得了进展，但检测和量化新型IPA事件仍然具有挑战性。为解决这一问题，我们开发了IPScan，这是一个用于精确识别、量化和可视化IPA事件的计算流程。IPScan已使用模拟数据、不同的人和小鼠细胞系以及TCGA（癌症基因组图谱）乳腺癌数据集与现有方法进行了基准测试。在不同生物学条件下，差异IPA事件通过qPCR进行了量化和验证。

Immunology.title: Evolutionary characterization of antiviral SAMD9/9L across kingdoms supports ancient convergence and lineage-specific adaptations
Immunology.summary: Nature Ecology & Evolution, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41559-025-02845-xA search for analogues of the human SAMD9/9L antiviral genes identifies convergent evolution of this gene family in the bacterial and animal kingdoms, with species-specific and recent genomic signatures indicative of adaptations resulting from evolutionary arms races with viruses.
Immunology.abstract: Human SAMD9 and SAMD9L are duplicated genes that encode innate immune proteins restricting poxviruses and lentiviruses, such as human immunodeficiency virus (HIV). Mutations in these genes are implicated in genetic diseases and cancer. Here we combined structural similarity searches, phylogenetics and population genomics with experimental assays of SAMD9/9L functions to resolve the evolutionary and functional dynamics of these immune proteins, spanning from prokaryotes to primates. We discovered structural analogues of SAMD9/9L in the antibacteriophage defence system, Avs, resulting from convergent evolution. Further, the predicted nuclease site was conserved in bacterial analogues and was essential for cell death, suggesting a fundamental role in defence across different life kingdoms. Despite this shared immunity, we identified genomic signatures of evolutionary arms races in mammals, with remarkable gene copy number variations. We further unveiled that the absence of SAMD9 in bonobos corresponds to a recent gene loss still segregating in the population. Finally, we found that chimpanzee and bonobo SAMD9Ls have enhanced anti-HIV-1 functions compared with the human orthologue. These SAMD9/9L adaptations probably resulted from strong viral selective pressures, including by lentiviruses, and could contribute to lentiviral resistance in bonobos. Evolutionary characterization of Avs9 and SAMD9/9L provides a deeper understanding of how the immune system adapts to fight viruses over billions of years of evolution. A search for analogues of the human SAMD9/9L antiviral genes identifies convergent evolution of this gene family in the bacterial and animal kingdoms, with species-specific and recent genomic signatures indicative of adaptations resulting from evolutionary arms races with viruses.

Immunology.title_cn: 抗病毒SAMD9/9L跨界进化表征揭示古老趋同进化与谱系特异性适应
Immunology.abstract_cn: 人类SAMD9和SAMD9L是重复基因，编码限制痘病毒和慢病毒（如人类免疫缺陷病毒（HIV））的先天免疫蛋白。这些基因的突变与遗传疾病和癌症有关。本研究结合结构相似性搜索、系统发育学、群体基因组学以及SAMD9/9L功能的实验分析，解析了这些免疫蛋白从原核生物到灵长类动物的进化和功能动态。我们发现，在抗噬菌体防御系统Avs中存在SAMD9/9L的结构同源物，这是趋同进化的结果。此外，预测的核酸酶位点在细菌同源物中是保守的，并且对细胞死亡至关重要，这表明其在不同生命界别的防御中具有基础性作用。尽管存在这种共享免疫性，我们仍在哺乳动物中发现了进化军备竞赛的基因组特征，并伴有显著的基因拷贝数变异。我们进一步揭示，倭黑猩猩中SAMD9的缺失对应着群体中仍在分离的近期基因丢失事件。最后，我们发现黑猩猩和倭黑猩猩的SAMD9L与人类直系同源物相比，具有增强的抗HIV-1功能。这些SAMD9/9L的适应性可能源于强大的病毒选择压力，包括慢病毒，并可能有助于倭黑猩猩对慢病毒的抵抗力。Avs9和SAMD9/9L的进化表征为深入理解免疫系统如何在数十亿年的进化中适应并对抗病毒提供了基础。对人类SAMD9/9L抗病毒基因同源物的搜索揭示了该基因家族在细菌界和动物界中的趋同进化，并伴有物种特异性和近期基因组特征，这些特征表明了与病毒进行进化军备竞赛所产生的适应性。

Immunology.title: Single-cell analysis reveals cell death as driver of NLRP3-mediated secretion of IL-1β in human monocytes
Immunology.summary: Nature Immunology, Published online: 11 November 2025;doi:10.1038/s41590-025-02319-zLamkanfi, Shirasaki, Izawa and colleagues show that IL-1β release in human monocytes stimulated with lipopolysaccharide or carrying NLRP3 activatory mutations is mostly restricted to cells undergoing lytic cell death.
Immunology.abstract: Interleukin-1β (IL-1β) is a key proinflammatory cytokine with critical roles in infections and inflammatory diseases, yet the mechanisms regulating its release from human monocytes remain unclear. Here we used a suite of single-cell approaches, including integrated live-cell imaging of secretion and cell fate, flow cytometry and high-content imaging, to investigate IL-1β secretion dynamics in lipopolysaccharide-stimulated primary human peripheral blood CD14+ monocytes. We found marked heterogeneity: a large fraction of cells remained viable and contributed negligibly to IL-1β secretion, challenging established models. Instead, a small subset (5–10%) undergoing canonical NLRP3 inflammasome activation and GSDMD-dependent pyroptosis produced the majority of secreted IL-1β, with a smaller contribution from apoptotic cells transitioning to secondary necrosis. Single-cell profiling of CD14+ monocytes from patients with cryopyrin-associated periodic syndrome confirmed lytic cell death as the driver of pathological IL-1β release. These findings redefine IL-1β as a damage-associated molecular pattern, secreted predominantly by dying monocytes. Lamkanfi, Shirasaki, Izawa and colleagues show that IL-1β release in human monocytes stimulated with lipopolysaccharide or carrying NLRP3 activatory mutations is mostly restricted to cells undergoing lytic cell death.
